item.title: Driver in custody after striking pedestrians in France, interior minister says
item.description: Interior Minister Laurent Nunez said a suspect was in custody.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani makes history -- and strikes a chord among Muslims, South Asians
item.description: Democrat Zohran Mamdani's projected victory as New York City’s first Muslim and South Asian mayor marks a historic moment.

item.title: What the Trump tariffs Supreme Court case could mean for the economy
item.description: The Supreme Court will hear oral arguments about Trump's tariffs on Wednesday.

item.title: WATCH: Abigail Spanberger delivers victory speech in Virginia
item.description: The Democrat is projected to win Virginia's governor race, making her the state's first female governor.

item.title: WATCH: Democrat Abigail Spanberger will win the VA governor's race, ABC News projects
item.description: Spanberger, who has maintained a consistent lead in the polls throughout the race, will be Virginia’s first female governor.
